title: Macquarie Lowers XPeng ( XPEV ) Target as Subsidy Cuts Weigh on Outlook
description: XPeng Inc. (NYSE:XPEV) ranks among the best high growth Chinese stocks to buy. On January 16, Macquarie lowered its price target for XPeng Inc.

XPeng Inc. (NYSE: [XPEV](https://www.insidermonkey.com/insider-trading/company/xpeng%20inc/1810997/)) ranks among the **[best high growth Chinese stocks to buy](https://www.insidermonkey.com/blog/8-high-growth-chinese-stocks-to-buy-1679808/?singlepage=1)**. On January 16, Macquarie lowered its price target for XPeng Inc. (NYSE:XPEV) from $32 to $26, while retaining an Outperform rating on the electric vehicle manufacturer. The firm referred to 2026 as a “transition year” for XPeng Inc. (NYSE:XPEV), as the company intends to grow its product selection with four additional models despite the possibly declining electric-vehicle interest in China.

!
